thread.title: Northern Indiana Weather Update: Warming Trend Builds to 50s by Tuesday - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Northern Indiana Weather Update: Warming Trend Builds to 50s by Tuesday - NewsBreak

author: County Herald Weather Center
title: Northern Indiana Weather Update: Warming Trend Builds to 50s by Tuesday - NewsBreak
text:
By County Herald Weather Center ,
50 minutes ago Country Herald is Local News, Independent Pulse. Covering breaking local news, sports, lifestyle and events. Fort Wayne, IN – A noticeable warming trend is setting up across northern Indiana after a cool weekend, with temperatures climbing steadily into midweek, according to the National Weather Service. According to the National Weather Service Northern Indiana, a high-pressure system will move through the region later Sunday, helping scatter clouds while keeping temperatures on […] This content first appeared on CountryHerald.com and is protected by copyright law.
